name: Hive Spy Remi: Mind Control Madness
name_original: Hive Spy Remi: Mind Control Madness
description:
A Saturn-like style game for the 2022 32-bit Game Jam!

Remi returns! While packing up for a vacation, a mad scientist invaded the hive with mind-controlled Hornets and is trying to get to the Queen! Help Remi prevent the kidnapping of the Queen and save the hive. Sneak past enemies and knock them out to progress.

Updated w/ permission to include 32-bit logo.

IF AUDIO CUTS OUT:

Try different browser. Sorry.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump / Hold to Hover / Skip Cutscene

Shift - Hold to Walk

LMB / Q - Punch

RMB / E - Throw smoke bomb

GamePad:

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Camera

South Face (Xbox A) - Jump / Hold to Hover / Skip Cutscene

Right Face (Xbox B) - Hold to Walk

Left Face (Xbox X) - Punch

Right Button - Throw smoke bomb
